parameters.name: BatchName
parameters.description: The name of the release batch.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval between two release batches.

parameters.name: OperationBase
parameters.description:
The dimension based on which the asset is selected. Valid values:

*   **0**: selects the asset by instance.
*   **1**: selects the asset by machine group.
*   **2**: selects the asset by the ID of the instance that is deployed in the virtual private cloud (VPC).

parameters.name: UpgradeVersion
parameters.description: The version to which you want to upgrade the agent.
